column4: Anyone know how I can connect at startup in irssi in channnels on different servers? Just adding them in .irssi/config together with the other channels doesn't seem to work. Though I get no error message. Anyone know what could be the problem?
i think the irssi homepage/docs mention how to do it.
i rarely mess with other servers any more.. but i recall doing it ages ago.
you also might want to check out 'znc' its a handy irc bouncer that can let you stay connected and irc into from other locations, so you never leave. :)
